featured.text: By exhaling air from the lungs in short (36) of laughter, breathing is quickened and heartbeats increased, which achieves (37) good as ten minutes on an exercise bike.

definition.zh_def: 心跳，指心臟收縮和舒張的過程，通常用來測量心臟的健康狀況。
definition.en_def: The rhythmic contraction and relaxation of the heart, typically measured to assess heart health.
definition.example: I could feel my heartbeat quicken as I ran up the hill.
